text: Raymond Herman Ulrich (August 28, 1898 - July 11, 1950) was an American football player for John Heisman's Georgia Tech Golden Tornado of the Georgia Institute of Technology. He played end on its 1917 team, the first team from the south to win a national championship. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1898 births Category:1950 deaths Category:Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets football players Category:American football ends Category:Players of American football from Illinois
title: Ray Ulrich
